WELCOME:
Welcome {name} 🤠

🪪 In this bot you can get the id of any group, channel, user or bot

📤 To use the bot, click on the buttons below and share the chat whose ID you want to know. - In response, the bot will return the ID of the chat you shared

> 🇺🇸 To change the language send the /lang command

> 📝 You can get the ID in many other ways. Send the /help command

> 🤑 Want to donate to me? Send the /donate command

📢 For updates on the bot subscribe to @GetChatID_Updates
NOT_HAVE_ID: ❌ The contact you sent has no ID
CAN_NOT_GET_THE_ID: ❌ It is not possible to get the ID of this chat
CHAT_MANAGER: 👮 By clicking the buttons below you can see all the groups and channels you manage and get their ID
INFO_REQUEST_CHAT:
**📤 request chat**

Click on the buttons below and share the chat whose ID you want to know.
- In response, the bot will return the ID of the chat you shared
INFO_FORWARD:
**⏩ forward message**

Forward any message to the bot (forward with quotes) and the bot will return the ID of the chat from which the message was sent.
INFO_STORY:
**📝 Story**

Transfer a story and get their ID.
INFO_SEARCH_USERNAME:
**🔍 Search by Username**

Send the username to the bot and the bot will return the ID of the chat with that username.
INFO_REPLY_TO_ANOTHER_CHAT:
**↩️ Reply to Another Chat**

Reply to any message in another chat, and the bot will return the ID of the chat from which the message was replied.
INFO_CONTACT:
**🪪 Contact**

Share a contact to the bot and the bot will return the contact's ID to you
INFO_REQUEST_ADMIN:
**👮‍ Request Admin**

Send the command /admin to get all the chats you have name management.
INFO_ME:
**👤 Get your ID**

Send the command /me to get your ID
INFO_LANGUAGE:
**🇺🇸 Language**

To change the language send the /lang command.
INFO_GROUP:
**👥 Group**

Add the bot to the group with the command `/add` and get the id of the group members with the command `/id`
INFO_ABOUT:
ℹ️ **Details about the bot**

Language: [Python](https://www.python.org/) 
Library: [pyrotgfork](https://telegramplayground.github.io/pyrogram/) 
Bot creator: @yehudalev 👨‍💻

Donations: You can support the bot creator with the /donate command

The bot is open source on GitHub 🖤
https://github.com/yehuda-lev/Get_Chat_ID_Bot

📢 For updates on the bot, subscribe to @GetChatID_Updates,
ADD_BOT_TO_GROUP:
**Add bot to group**

Click on the button to add the bot to the group to get id's of members in the group
BOT_ADDED_TO_GROUP:
**Bot added to group**

The bot was added to the group {group_name} • `{group_id}`
to get ids of members in the group, send the command `/id` in the group
INFO_BUSINESS:
**🔗 Business connection**

You can connect the bot to your business and get the ID of any chat.
> Go to settings > Telegram Business > Chatbot > and select this bot
Then you can send the command `.id` in any private chat to get the chat ID.
You can also get the ID without sending a message in the chat!
> Go to the chat and then click on the bot management button and the bot will send the ID of the chat you came from
BUSINESS_CONNECTION:
**🔗 Business connection**
Hi, thanks for connecting with me! 
You can use me by sending the command `.id` in any chat (private) to get the chat ID.
> You can also get the ID without sending a message in the chat!
> Go to the chat and then click on the bot management button and the bot will send the ID of the chat you came from
BUSINESS_CONNECTION_DISABLED:
**🔗 Business connection**
I'm sorry, but I can't reply to your messages. If you want to get the chat ID, enable the permission to reply to messages.
BUSINESS_CONNECTION_REMOVED:
**🔗 Business connection**
I'm sorry to see you go, but I'm always here if you need me.
ID_BY_MANAGE_BUSINESS: 🪪 The ID of the chat you came from is: `{}`
ASK_AMOUNT_TO_PAY:
Hi, thanks for wanting to donate to me 🥰
Choose the donation amount you want to give 👇
PAYMENT_SUCCESS:
🎉 Thank you for your donation 🎉
I received your donation of {} ⭐️
FORMAT_LINK:
Send the command with the chat ID
For example:
> `/link 777000`
